sentence.Network_en: Monstrously inflated costs are designed to keep the hoi polloi at bay.
sentence.Network_cn: 居高不下的生活开支势必会把老百姓逼入走投无路的境地。

PerfectNetExp.abs: why do you think would the rich , usually so quick to isolate themselves in real life , be so eager to embrace the hoi polloi online ?你认为，那些在现实世界中往往很快把自己隔绝起来的富人为什么会如此热切地投入到网络大众中去？

auth_sentence.content: For other Olympians, letting their hair down means mixing with the hoi polloi.

auth_sentence.content: They're trying to get rid of the hoi polloi and make Venice into a country club for the wealthy.
